name: Jojo's Treasure
description:
Jojo is on the hunt for treasure! Dig your way deep into an underground cave to find and collect the key that will unlock the treasure. Defeat enemies, you face along the way by pushing them into the holes you dig.

Dig your way to victory in this dungeon crawler mini-game!

(you can also click on the map within the game for more information)

known bugs:

  • unable to find 3 keys to unlock the treasure

Art: poddlesli

Programming: Victor Sassi
